name: Enterprise Cloud
oneline: Enterprise Cloud has provided us a perfect fit for our hybrid multicloud infrastructure and with flexible cloud resource allocation according to our needs in each moment. NTT is a Japan based company with presents in US. The US arm seems to be expanding, but its not all there yet. NTT Data is simple to work with, stable, and overall great experience. We were able to get up and running in a short period of time and they were able to assist whenever we needed the assistance. Consistent quality of services, a good tech level of the managed services organization, needs work on innovation part - catching up. Technical support is best. They really spent tiume understanding our business and future drivers so I felt this would be a partnership.
